title: OMG RIOT!!!!!!!!!! :D
body:
Gravelord Azir.... 

i cant express how insanely happy i am over this!!!

not only is my favourite champ the best looking champ in the game (maybe 2nd after kindred now.. yet to decide.)

he is also voiced by the voice actor of my favourite anime character  

and is my fave playstyle

but now...

my favourite champ of all time get a new skin and not only that..

 its a fucking awesome skin!!! :D

thanks riot so much!!! good job guys!

the next two weeks will honestly be the longest of my life waiting for this D:

replies.body: I personally love the Ryze one! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Its probably the best skin outta the new ones coming out! Gragas, ryze and varus are a lil dissapointing, 750skins seem like a waste of time, i'd rather them improve them to look better and up the price like the azir skin!

> [{quoted}](name=DarkenedKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=T9qrcw3d,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-11T11:18:01.468+0000)
>
> Its probably the best skin outta the new ones coming out! Gragas, ryze and varus are a lil dissapointing, 750skins seem like a waste of time, i'd rather them improve them to look better and up the price like the azir skin!

that dj sona skin looks good should u buy it? Kappa {{summoner:31}}
looks like they took karthus splash and edited it...
